languages.text: Во время варп-перелета на одной из палуб вспыхнул пожар. Разбушевавшаяся стихия поглотила целый отсек, уничтожив бесценные грузы и повредив внутреннюю обшивку. Виновные не были установлены. При разборах завалов несколько человек уверяли, что гарь на пласталевых балках складывалась в строки на неизвестном Человечеству языке. Все бредящие были казнены, от их тел избавились.

A fire broke out on one of the decks during the warp voyage. The raging disaster consumed the entire chamber, destroying precious cargo and damaging the interior plating. No guilty parties were found. While clearing out the rubble, a few people claimed the soot on the plasteel beams formed lines in a cryptic alien language not known to humans. The delirious workers were executed and their bodies disposed of in the proper manner.
languages.original_text: Во время варп-перелета на одной из палуб вспыхнул пожар. Разбушевавшаяся стихия поглотила целый отсек, уничтожив бесценные грузы и повредив внутреннюю обшивку. Виновные не были установлены. При разборах завалов несколько человек уверяли, что гарь на пласталевых балках складывалась в строки на неизвестном Человечеству языке. Все бредящие были казнены, от их тел избавились.

languages.text: 亚空间航行期间，某层甲板发生了火灾。肆虐的火焰吞噬了整个船舱，烧毁了值钱的货物，还损坏了内部镀层。这场火灾没有发现任何犯罪嫌疑人，而在清理废墟时，一群人声称塑钢钢梁上的煤烟组成了某种未知的神秘外星语言。这些胡言乱语的工人随后遭到了处决，他们的尸体也得到了妥善处理。
languages.original_text: A fire broke out on one of the decks during the warp voyage. The raging disaster consumed the entire chamber, destroying precious cargo and damaging the interior plating. No guilty parties were found. While clearing out the rubble, a few people claimed the soot on the plasteel beams formed lines in a cryptic alien language not known to humans. The delirious workers were executed and their bodies disposed of in the proper manner.

traits.locale_text: 亚空间航行期间，某层甲板发生了火灾。肆虐的火焰吞噬了整个船舱，烧毁了值钱的货物，还损坏了内部镀层。这场火灾没有发现任何犯罪嫌疑人，而在清理废墟时，一群人声称塑钢钢梁上的煤烟组成了某种未知的神秘外星语言。这些胡言乱语的工人随后遭到了处决，他们的尸体也得到了妥善处理。

languages.text: Durante el viaje de la disformidad se produjo un incendio en una de las cubiertas. El desastre arrasó toda la cámara, destruyendo la valiosa carga y dañando el revestimiento interior. No se encontraron culpables. Mientras limpiaban los escombros, algunas personas afirmaron que el hollín de las vigas de plastiacero formaba líneas en un críptico lenguaje alienígena desconocido para los humanos. Los trabajadores que deliraban fueron ejecutados y sus cuerpos eliminados de la forma adecuada.
languages.original_text: A fire broke out on one of the decks during the warp voyage. The raging disaster consumed the entire chamber, destroying precious cargo and damaging the interior plating. No guilty parties were found. While clearing out the rubble, a few people claimed the soot on the plasteel beams formed lines in a cryptic alien language not known to humans. The delirious workers were executed and their bodies disposed of in the proper manner.

El desastre arrasó toda la cámara, destruyendo la valiosa carga y dañando el revestimiento interior. No se encontraron culpables. Mientras limpiaban los escombros, algunas personas afirmaron que el hollín de las vigas de plastiacero formaba líneas en un críptico lenguaje alienígena desconocido para los humanos. Los trabajadores que deliraban fueron ejecutados y sus cuerpos eliminados de la forma adecuada.

languages.text: <歪み>を航海中に、デッキのひとつで火災が発生した。激しい炎が部屋全体を飲み込み、貴重な貨物を焼き尽くして、内部のメッキを傷つけた。犯人は見つかっていない。瓦礫を片付けている間に何人かから、プラスチールの梁に被ったススが、人間に知られていない謎の異星人語の形になっているとの声が上がる。正気ではない作業員は処刑されて、その遺体は適切な方法で処分された。
languages.original_text: A fire broke out on one of the decks during the warp voyage. The raging disaster consumed the entire chamber, destroying precious cargo and damaging the interior plating. No guilty parties were found. While clearing out the rubble, a few people claimed the soot on the plasteel beams formed lines in a cryptic alien language not known to humans. The delirious workers were executed and their bodies disposed of in the proper manner.

traits.locale_text: <歪み>を航海中に、デッキのひとつで火災が発生した。激しい炎が部屋全体を飲み込み、貴重な貨物を焼き尽くして、内部のメッキを傷つけた。犯人は見つかっていない。瓦礫を片付けている間に何人かから、プラスチールの梁に被ったススが、人間に知られていない謎の異星人語の形になっているとの声が上がる。正気ではない作業員は処刑されて、その遺体は適切な方法で処分された。

languages.text: Un incendie se déclare sur l'un des ponts pendant le passage dans le Warp, ravageant un quartier entier, détruisant de précieuses ressources et endommageant la cloison intérieure. Aucun coupable n'est identifié. Lors du déblaiement, certaines personnes affirment que la suie sur les poutres en plastacier a formé des lignes rédigées dans une langue inconnue. Les ouvriers délirants sont exécutés et leurs dépouilles sont prises en charge comme il se doit.
languages.original_text: A fire broke out on one of the decks during the warp voyage. The raging disaster consumed the entire chamber, destroying precious cargo and damaging the interior plating. No guilty parties were found. While clearing out the rubble, a few people claimed the soot on the plasteel beams formed lines in a cryptic alien language not known to humans. The delirious workers were executed and their bodies disposed of in the proper manner.

Aucun coupable n'est identifié. Lors du déblaiement, certaines personnes affirment que la suie sur les poutres en plastacier a formé des lignes rédigées dans une langue inconnue. Les ouvriers délirants sont exécutés et leurs dépouilles sont prises en charge comme il se doit.

languages.text: Während der Warp ist auf einem der Decks ein Feuer ausgebrochen. Die tosenden Flammen haben die gesamte Kammer verschlungen, wertvolle Fracht zerstört und die Innenpanzerung beschädigt. Es konnten keine Schuldigen ausgemacht werden. Als der Schutt aufgeräumt wurde, behaupteten einige Leute, dass der Ruß auf den Plaststahlträgern Text in einer kryptischen, der Menschheit unbekannten Aliensprache formte. Die halluzinierenden Arbeiter wurden hingerichtet und ihre Leichen ordnungsgemäß entsorgt.

No guilty parties were found. While clearing out the rubble, a few people claimed the soot on the plasteel beams formed lines in a cryptic alien language not known to humans. languages.text: Öteboyut yolculuğu sırasında güvertelerden birinde yangın çıktı. Şiddetle büyüyen felaket, tüm bölmeyi sararak değerli kargoları yok etti ve iç kaplamalara zarar verdi. Olayda suçlu bir taraf bulunmadı. Enkaz temizliği yapan birkaç kişi, plasçelik kirişlerdeki is lekelerinin insanların bilmediği, esrarengiz bir yabancı dilde yazılar oluşturduğunu iddia etti. Bu deli işçiler idam edildi ve cesetleri de uygun şekilde imha edildi.
languages.original_text: A fire broke out on one of the decks during the warp voyage. The raging disaster consumed the entire chamber, destroying precious cargo and damaging the interior plating. No guilty parties were found. While clearing out the rubble, a few people claimed the soot on the plasteel beams formed lines in a cryptic alien language not known to humans. The delirious workers were executed and their bodies disposed of in the proper manner.
